test_cases.title: Successfully register a new pet owner
description: The receptionist navigates to the 'Find Owner' page;
The receptionist clicks the 'Add Owner' button;
The receptionist fills out the form with a valid name, last name, address, city, and telephone number;
The system displays the Owner Information screen;

test_cases.title: Failed registration with missing name field
description: The receptionist navigates to the 'Find Owner' page;
The receptionist clicks the 'Add Owner' button;
The receptionist attempts to submit the form without filling in the name field;
The system displays an error message: 'No field can be left empty' and prevents form submission;
